Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Ms. Ramirez did not testify, raising credibility concerns
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of cohabitation, absence of testimony, credibility issues
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Marriage must be genuine, not primarily for immigration benefit
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether IAD applied correct test and made reasonable decision
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of cohabitation evidence, credibility concerns, religious differences
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Unresolved credibility due to lack of testimony and inconsistent cohabitation claims
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant had opportunity to present case; no procedural unfairness found
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant – principal party did not testify
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD’s application of test and reasonableness of decision
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, Section 4
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative appeals
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to testify and provide direct evidence

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage based on intent and evidence
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of IAD decision on spousal sponsorship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative inference from Ms. Ramirez not testifying
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine; entered primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility issues, lack of cohabitation, failure to testify
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Marriage must be genuine, not a means to obtain status
Crimes.Application_Factor: Intent and behavior indicative of genuine relationship
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of cohabitation, credibility gaps, primary purpose for immigration
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure of key individual to testify despite available evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Substantial – non-participation in hearing affected assessment
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation that IAD used wrong test or unreasonably assessed evidence
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, Section 4
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of administrative decisions
